concepts.label: Stains
concepts.definition: a review concept used for when the traveler has seen stained linens or inexplicable blotches of unknown origin in the room or around the property

concepts.label: Slow check-in
concepts.definition: a review concept used to illustrate that the process for checking in to the property took too long

concepts.label: Location nightlife
concepts.definition: Rating about nightlife at the property location, based on user-generated content

concepts.label: Private pool (positive sentiment)
concepts.definition: A review sentiment used for positive reactions to the property's private pool

concepts.label: Unhelpful
concepts.definition: a review concept used for when the employees of the property do not offer to help the travelers or are reluctant to help them, especially when the travelers are experiencing a problem or difficulty

concepts.label: Slow service
concepts.definition: a review concept used for any time the employees or services took to long to arrive or respond to traveler needs

concepts.label: Airport shuttle
concepts.definition: Rating about distance and connections of a property to an airport, based on user-generated content

concepts.label: Dirty (room)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers to how dirty the reviewer thought the room was.

concepts.label: Public transit
concepts.definition: Rating about public transit options around a property, based on user-generated content

concepts.label: Parking available
concepts.definition: Review sentiments expressing there is parking available at the property

concepts.label: Other negative sentiments (staff and services)
concepts.definition: this is a reviews concept and covers anything else not specified in the other categories for negative sentiments

concepts.label: Room noise (positive sentiment)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept - it means that the reviewer has commented on the level of noise in the room they stayed in a specifically positive sentiment.

concepts.label: Bar (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: Negative review sentiments about the bar at the property

concepts.label: Restaurant (positive sentiment)
concepts.definition: A review concept used when the restaurant amenity was represented as expected

concepts.label: Pet access (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: A review concept used when the pet access amenity or policy was not represented as expected

concepts.label: Fitness facilities available
concepts.definition: Review sentiments confirming that fitness facilities are available at the property

concepts.label: Restaurant unavailable
concepts.definition: It has been confirmed that there is no restaurant at the property

concepts.label: Quiet (location)
concepts.definition: It refers to the area around the hotel - it could be the street, neighborhood, or city.

concepts.label: Property condition (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: a concept used to review or provide negative opinions about the property and it's upkeep

concepts.label: Bed (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: \ta concept use to provide a negative review for the property's bed (s)

concepts.label: Accessibility
concepts.definition: a review concept used for the impressions of the properties accessibility amenities.

concepts.definition: It refers to the area around the hotel - it could be the street, neighborhood, or city.

concepts.label: Room layout
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. It refers to how pleasing or displeasing the traveler found the organization of furniture and the physical arrangement of the room they stayed in.

concepts.label: Delayed check-in
concepts.definition: a review concept used to express that the check-in process was prevented by something that was perhaps in the property's control\n

concepts.label: Spa
concepts.definition: A review concept used to gather impressions of the property's spa

concepts.label: Review sentiments
concepts.definition: ratings based on UGC (user generated content) as well as other review sources

concepts.label: Great amenities
concepts.definition: amenities were of high quality

concepts.label: Furniture in poor condition
concepts.definition: a review concept used for negative feelings of the way the furniture felt or looked (uncomfortable, broken, etc)

concepts.label: Few amenities
concepts.definition: too few amenities; not enough amenities; the amenities present were limited, scarce, not numerous

concepts.label: On-site winery
concepts.definition: Review sentiments about a winery that is on-site to the property

concepts.label: Poor room service
concepts.definition: reviewers have described the room service provided as poor, e.g. very slow, with limited availability or options

concepts.label: Good property condition
concepts.definition: reviewers have described the property as being in good condition, e.g. with recently updated decor, good services, or high quality facilities\n

concepts.label: Decor
concepts.definition: a review concept used for negative sentiments towards the way the property and fixings are decorated.

concepts.definition: A review concept used when the breakfast amenity was not represented as expected

concepts.label: WiFi unavailable
concepts.definition: It has been confirmed that wifi is unavailable at the property

concepts.definition: a concept used to review or provide negative opinions about the employees and  intangible products

concepts.definition: It has been confirmed that fitness facilities are unavailable at the property

concepts.definition: a review concept used for negative sentiments the traveler has with the quality or feeling of the linens in the room or on the property

concepts.label: Pet-friendly
concepts.definition: A review sentiment for indicating if the property is or is not welcoming to pets, such as having special amenities that cater to them.

concepts.label: Unprofessional
concepts.definition: a review concept used for when the staff or employees behave in a manner that the reviewer considers to be unprofessional, impolite, etc.

concepts.definition: A review concept used when the air conditioning amenity was not represented as expected

concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers specifically to the comfort the customer experienced in the room. How well they slept, etc.

concepts.label: Workspace
concepts.definition:
Review sentiments about a space or area designated for or well equipped for undertaking work, usually containing furniture such as desks, tables, etc. or facilities such as laptop docking or charging points, WiFi, etc.

In Vacation Rentals, such a space is likely to be less formal or well-equipped than similar spaces in Conventional Lodging

concepts.label: Room service
concepts.definition: A service at a hotel or other property allowing guests to order food and drink straight to their rooms

concepts.definition: It has been confirmed that the rooms and/or property are air conditioned

concepts.definition: a review concept used when the traveler discovered their check-in information was wrong

concepts.definition: a review concept used for indicating whether or not the property is welcoming to business travelers

concepts.definition: Rating on the staff of a property, based on user-generated content

concepts.definition: a review concept used for people's feelings surrounding the check- in process

concepts.definition: reviewers have described room service at the property as good, e.g. fast, efficient, good availability, with many options

concepts.label: Vibes

concepts.definition: A review concept used for impressions of the property's fitness facilities

concepts.definition: A review concept used when the wifi amenity was represented as expected

concepts.label: Amenities
concepts.definition: Review sentiment capturing generic reviews about the range and quality of the property amenities

concepts.definition: a concept used to review or provide positive opinions about the employees and intangible products

concepts.label: Winery
concepts.definition: Review sentiments about a Winery

concepts.label: Room comfort (level of)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. It means that the traveller comments on the level of comfort of their room, how comfortable it was to stay in it, how well they slept, how nice the furniture was, etc. It may be a positive or negative review.

concepts.label: Private pool
concepts.definition: A review sentiment used for impressions of the property's private pool

concepts.label: Uncomfortable room
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers specifically to the discomfort the customer experienced in the room. How badly they slept, etc.

concepts.label: Pets allowed (at lodging)
concepts.definition: This is a review concept. It has been confirmed that pets are allowed at the property

concepts.label: Room cleanliness (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers to any negative feelings the reviewer had about the room's propriety.

concepts.definition: Review sentiments on a kitchen/kitchenette being unavailable at the property/unit/room

concepts.label: Air conditioning
concepts.definition: Review concept used for impressions of the room or property's air conditioning

concepts.label: Noisy (location)
concepts.definition: It refers to the area around the hotel - it could be the street, neighborhood, or city.

concepts.label: Rude staff
concepts.definition: a concept used to review or provide negative opinions about the employees when they were not polite

concepts.label: Room decor
concepts.definition: the decorations, interior design, fixtures and fittings such as curtains, etc. in a room.\n\nIn reviews, this concept is used when travellers describe how pleasant or unpleasant they thought the room had been decorated - whether they liked the colors and finishes, whether they thought the carpet was nice or horrible, etc.

concepts.label: Bad smell or odor
concepts.definition: a review concept used for when the traveler experiences a terrible smell that cannot be explained somewhere in the room or property

concepts.label: Fitness facilities (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: A review concept used when the fitness facility amenities were not represented as expected

concepts.label: Other room review sentiments
concepts.definition: Grouping concept for review sentiments not being used by XMD

concepts.label: Room comfort (positive sentiment)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers to any positive feelings the reviewer had about the room's comfort

concepts.label: Pests
concepts.definition: a review concept for when the traveler has seen rodents or other undesirable creatures aside from insects in the room or on the property where they shouldn't be

concepts.label: Wifi  (negative sentiment)
concepts.definition: A review concept used when the wifi amenity was not represented as expected

concepts.label: Clean (room)
concepts.definition: This is a reviews concept. it refers to how clean the reviewer thought the room was.

concepts.label: Lacked training
concepts.definition: this is a review concept and refers to the employees at the property when they don't seem to know the answer to key questions that should have been covered in their onboarding process.

concepts.label: Early check-in
concepts.definition: the option to check in to a property or rental prior to the standard check-in time

concepts.label: All-inclusive
concepts.definition: Review sentiments about the property being of an all-inclusive board type

concepts.definition: A review sentiment used for negative impressions of the casino

concepts.label: Safe location
concepts.definition: Rating about safety at the property location, based on user-generated content

concepts.label: Recommend
concepts.definition: This is the verb form - to recommend, make a recommendation, say that the lodging is good, etc.

concepts.label: Understaffed
concepts.definition: a review sentiment used for when the property doesn't have enough people employed for the required tasks
